person.persName: David Cloyd James (Union Circuit Court clerk)

body.p: Union County, Kentucky, attorney and court clerk. Nashville, Tennessee native. Son of William James and Martha Cloyd James. Married Sarah A. Nunn James in Crittenden County, Kentucky. Married Frances B. Cary James. Married Martha A. Kirk James. Married Amanda Morris James on September 28, 1865 in Webster County, Kentucky. Father of Morris James, Harry James, Lucy A. James, and Martha James. Joined the Methodist Church in 1842. Managed mines in Crittenden County from 1847 to 1854. Joined the Masonic Lodge in Morganfield, Kentucky, in 1852. Farmer in Union County in 1854. Manager and book-keeper at Curlew Mines in Union County from 1857 to 1860. Farmer in Union County from 1860 to 1863. Clerk of the Union Circuit Court from 1863 to 1868.
